data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ortiz, Luis Hernández Georgina Ramírez, Reyes-Bonilla, Héctor (2013): Coral-associated decapods (Crustacea) from the Mexican Tropical Pacific coast. Zootaxa 3609 (5): 451-464, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3609.5.1
